name: Rock Point Site
shortDec: Rock Point Provincial Park is a park located on the north shore of Lake Erie near the mouth of the Grand River in the Carolinian zone of southwestern Ontario. It occupies an area of 1.87 square kilometres. Habitats within the park include wetlands, forests and dunes. Trees include the uncommon Big Shellbark Hickory.

name: West Forest Site
shortDec: West Forest Site is a park located on the north shore of Lake Erie near the mouth of the Grand River in the Carolinian zone of southwestern Ontario. It occupies an area of 1.87 square kilometres. Habitats within the park include wetlands, forests and dunes. Trees include the uncommon Big Shellbark Hickory.

name: Lake View Lot
shortDec: Lake View (alternatively Lakeview) is a locality in South Australia beside the Augusta Highway between Snowtown and Redhill.[1][2] The name is from that of the historic railway siding, Lake View Railway Station, within the locality[1] and refers to the string of small salt lakes at the location, beside Barunga East Road.
